outfit_data.top: A pristine white linen blouse with delicate puffed sleeves and a relaxed, empire waistline. The lightweight fabric drapes beautifully, creating a flowing silhouette that complements the breezy seaside setting.
outfit_data.bottom: Charcoal gray seersucker wide-leg trousers offer both comfort and sophistication. Their slightly structured weave adds visual interest while remaining breathable for warm weather.
outfit_data.shoes: Sleek black pointed-toe heels crafted from premium leather complete the look. The moderate heel height provides a touch of elegance without sacrificing practicality on sandy shores.
outfit_data.extras: A large woven straw tote bag in natural hues carries all your essentials, adding a touch of casual refinement. A delicate gold chain necklace with a small pearl pendant adds a subtle sparkle to the monochrome palette.
